bug.author: mfernezir
bug.summary: Error when pressing Visualize LR if Step Size given with decimal point
bug.description: While creating a new model from an old one with clone model, DIGITS (Version 3.1-dev) sets the Step Size format on its own to decimal (e.g. from 5 to 5.0). This then throws an error when Visualize LR is pressed. If corrected back to pure integer value, the error goes away. 500: INTERNAL SERVER ERROR ValueError invalid literal for int() with base 10: '5.0'

comments.comment: Thanks for the bug report, I have pushed a change which should fix this (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/DIGITS/pull/534>#534</denchmark-link> )
